00577 
00578   /*
00579     Map analogue voltage offset (-1V-1V) to 16 bit ADC value (0-65535=2^16-1)
00580     Dynamic ranges:
00581     0x0000 -> -2V to 0V
00582     0x8000 -> -1V to 1V

00593     }
00594

00596     {
00597       cm_msg(MINFO,"dt5720_update_digitizer","Invalid voltage offset. Set to 1V.");
00598       return adcmin;
00599     }
00600   else if(v<analogmin)
00601     {
00602       cm_msg(MINFO,"dt5720_update_digitizer","Invalid voltage offset. Set to -1V.");
00603       return adcmax;
00604     }
00605 
00606   v += 1.;
00607 
00608   uint32_t dac = slope*v;
00609   printf("DAC offset: channel %i DAC %i\n",ch, dac);
00610 
00611 
00612   return dac;

00409       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetTriggerPolarity(handle,2,CAEN_DGTZ_TriggerOnRisingEdge);
00410       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetTriggerPolarity(handle,3,CAEN_DGTZ_TriggerOnRisingEdge);
00411     }
00412   else
00413     {
00414       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetTriggerPolarity(handle,0,CAEN_DGTZ_TriggerOnFallingEdge);
00415       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetTriggerPolarity(handle,1,CAEN_DGTZ_TriggerOnFallingEdge);
00416       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetTriggerPolarity(handle,2,CAEN_DGTZ_TriggerOnFallingEdge);
00417       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetTriggerPolarity(handle,3,CAEN_DGTZ_TriggerOnFallingEdge);
00418     }
00419   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return false;
00420 
00421   if(S_DT5720_ODB.max_events_per_block >= 2 && S_DT5720_ODB.max_events_per_block <= 1024)
00422     {
00423       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetMaxNumEventsBLT(handle,S_DT5720_ODB.max_events_per_block);
00424     }

00426     {
00427       ret = CAEN_DGTZ_SetMaxNumEventsBLT(handle,1024);

00492 
00493   // Channel specific

00495   if(S_DT5720_ODB.ch00.enable)

00497   if(S_DT5720_ODB.ch01.enable)

00544     {

00546       return FE_ERR_HW;
00547     }
00548   
00549   // ======================================================================================
00550   // Channel configuration through register 0x8000=CAEN_DGTZ_BROAD_CH_CTRL_ADD
00551   // ======================================================================================
00552   uint32_t data;
00553   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_ReadRegister(handle, CAEN_DGTZ_BROAD_CH_CTRL_ADD, &data);
00554   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__-1,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return FE_ERR_HW;
00555 
00556   // Bit 4 must always be set to 1
00557   data |= (1<<4);
00558   // enable trigger overlap
00559   data |= (1<<1);
00560   ret = CAEN_DGTZ_WriteRegister(handle, CAEN_DGTZ_BROAD_CH_CTRL_ADD, data);
00561   if(is_caen_error(ret,__LINE__-1,"dt5720_update_digitizer")) return FE_ERR_HW;
00562 
00563   data_buffer_size = 32*1024*1024;
00564   data_buffer = (char*) malloc(data_buffer_size);
00565
